title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-14] [$250] Multi tags - Unable to save GL code for dependant tags
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Precondition:
- Workspace is under Control plan
- Workspace is imported with dependant tags on Old Dot
1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to workspace settings > Tags
3. Click on any tag
4. Click on any subtag
5. Click GL code
6. Enter the GL code and save it
7. Click on the same subtag again

Expected result: GL code will be saved

Actual result: None
